summary:
I have a master degree in management of development specialisation of Food and nutrition security got from Van Hall Larenstein university of applied sciences- Netherlands: a one year program that started from the 1st October 2018 and ended on the 30th September 2019 where I was learning a lot on how to improve food security of people,how to be a good change agent and a good leader with improved communication and interpersonal skills, how to design an intervention needed in an organisation.

I finished my bachelor degree in 2011 from the higher institute of agriculture and animal Husbandry from Rwanda in the faculty of Agricultural engineering and environmental sciences, soil and water management department. I have 7 years of working experience from Rwanda: in these years I have been working with farmers in soil and water conservation(Terraces construction and maintenance); Improving farmers knowledge on the use of improved agricultural practices so as to increase their productivity.

school.name: Van Hall Larenstein University of Applied Sciences

education.field_of_study: Management of development programme-Food and Nutrition security Specialisation
